definition: Russia/Russian/abbr. for 俄羅斯|俄罗斯[E2 luo2 si1]/Taiwan pr. [E4]

sentences.english: I was what, nine years old and they found Earl dead in a irrigation ditch.
sentences.chinese: 我那時纔多大，九歲吧，有人發現俄爾死在灌溉圳裏。

sentences.english: The Orpheum Wiener House stayed afloat all through the Great Depression.
sentences.chinese: 從大蕭條開始到結束，俄爾甫香腸之家一直垮。

sentences.english: I was what, nine years old and they found Earl dead in a irrigation ditch .
sentences.chinese: 我那時纔多大，九歲吧，有人發現俄爾死在灌溉圳裏。
